overrides.description:
It’s been a tough century. First you had the plagues, then you had the riots, then you had that one guy 
who swore he could summon the spirits of our ancestors—and we all know how that turned out. 
But now, two billion deaths later, we have peace. Good job, [player]! Those of us who survived knew you could do it!
Wow, what a century! Not such a great start, but hey. We got somewhere.
Hey, we made it to stability!
Judging by the radiation damage, this has been out here for millions of years. Crazy that the AC still works.
This is how you tell someone's in charge: by their cloak.
